name: Shadow Wealth
description:
The new-world aristocrats just struck a deal with the underworld that'll grant them eternal wealth! Their sacrifice: tonight's shipment. Its contents: human slaves. In the dark of night, you must hunt these debauchers and destroy their operation before the captive souls are lost forever. Gather your blade! The mission starts tonight.

Stab, step, stave, and scurry through Lord De Grotto's entourage in this simple (yet challenging) boss-rush sword-fighting game! Earn the high score, or play through unlockable modes to uncover the secret plots within The House Of Suffering.
